textBlock.text: This is an optional section that can be used for content that may be useful for some users, but is not essential for everyone. Key information that all users need to see should always appear in the lead paragraph.

helpText: Whole sentences usually give few or no results. Try a more general search with few words, and use the filter to narrow it down.
Use quotation marks to search for an exact phrase, for example “private sector”. This will show only tables that contain that exact combination of words.
Use title: to search only in the table name, for example title:stockholm.
You can add or remove items from this search help list to make it relevant for your specific database.
